root.name: Grease Dance
root.description: Grease Dance is a dancing and/or singing game featuring music from the movie Grease and other era-appropriate songs. Players can sing and dance to over 20 songs, including:Rock'n'Roll Party QueenGreaseYou're the One That I WantLook at Me, I'm Sandra DeeHound DogSummer NightsGreased LightningLong Tall SallyRock Around the ClockTutti FruittiJail House RockYakety YakBorn to HandjiveWe Go TogetherThe game features a "Dance" mode with 17 different routines, a "Karaoke" mode, and a "Party Play" mode for up to eight players. Players can also unlock montages of clips from the movie. Kinect for Xbox 360 or Move for PlayStation 3 is required.
